name: Captivated Hearts
description:
This design is plain and simply just showing people with their hearts captivated by God.  God is pulling their hearts up towards the heavens.  Its a daily reminder for me to give 110% of my heart to God and let him transform me and mold me into what HE wants me to be.  Its not easy all the time, but I find that the closer I give everything up to God the more I realize that my heart and my life are in HIS hands.  What are a few things in your life that you need to do or give up to let God captivate your heart more?

This shirt is a grey slate in color.  Each shirt has hand painted bleach with a black ink design.  Designs on both the front and back!

100% cotton. American Apparel.

Any questions or comments or if you just want to say "hi" . . . feel free to email me "Tom" at . . . lioncrest@gmail.com

Thanks!

P.S.- Want anything custom please just ask.  I making your clothes custom!

name: Only Time Will Tell
description:
Often times in this busy world we get to a point when all we do is WORRY.  Worry about tomorrow, worry about the past, worry about the bills, worry about school, worry about what we are going to be when we are older, and just plain worry about our busy lives.  I personally find myself worrying WAY too much.  Thats where I got the inspiration for this new shirt.  The text in this design is a reference to Matthew 6:25-27.  I have found that the less we worry in life the more we realize that GOD is in control.  "Only Time Will Tell where he has us in the future."

This shirt was hand made and went through a series of hand bleaching and washing techniques with the addition of the three colored design printed on the front and the back.  A lot of time and dedication.  Lastly, no animals were harmed in the making of this shirt.

The material of this shirt is American Apparel 50% polyester, 50% cotton.  All shirts are unisex sizes.  

Any questions or comments feel free to contact me . . . "Tom" at . . .  lioncrest@gmail.com

name: Pattern of this World
description:
This is a fun design idea I got in reference to Romans 12:2.  It is showing multiple patterns and pure craziness.  I think thats the way the world is sometimes.  We get in this mediocre lifestyle of how things have to be done and the patterns of life that the normal people in our society do things.  This shirt is a reminder to not live a mediocre lifestyle and live with a filter from the things that surround you.  If we can learn to filter the things that come at us on a daily basis we won't be confined to the mediocre pattern way of thinking.  Choose your filter and choose wisely!

This shirt is 100% cotton.  American Apparel

It has a one color design on the front with a light bleach pattern and LC logo on the back.  Some of you may be lucky to get a unique wash out look with the pattern on the front of this shirt . . . if you are one of the 7 people to get a rare shirt email me with a photo of you wearing your shirt and I will give you 25% off your next order.  All just for fun . . . just because.

Any questions or comments about this shirt or if you just want to say hi . . . feel free to email me "Tom" at lioncrest@gmail.com.  

Thanks!

name: Rarrrr !!!
description:
This shirt is a fun bleach pattern shirt with the 2009 Summer logo.  More color options of this shirt in the near future!

Each shirt is hand stamped with bleach in several areas of the FULL front of the shirt with one color design.  Also hand stamped with bleach on the back with the LC logo.

50% Polyester. 50% Cotton. American Apparel.

I can't take credit for this sweet design.  This was designed by a friend of mine.  Any questions or if you would like my friend to design another shirt with a similar look let me know.  email me with questions, comments, and hellos at . . . lioncrest@gmail.com

Thanks!

-Tom
